metadata.title: CVE-2021-46981 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: nbd:Fix NULL pointer in flush_workqueue Open /dev/nbdX first, the config_refswill be 1 and the pointers in nbd_device are still null. Disconnect/dev/nbdX, then reference a null recv_workq. The protection by config_refsin nbd_genl_disconnect is useless.
